Interface ReplacementBase

All Superinterfaces:
Function<LegacyFormatSource,StringReplacement>
public interface ReplacementBase extends Function<LegacyFormatSource,StringReplacement>
An interface to create the StringReplacement from the LegacyFormatSource.
